review.title: “Executive management nightmare - what a shame for a great company”
review.pros: Pros – Great product and capabilities. Excellent people in engineering and inside sales support
review.cons: Cons – President is an complete moron. Doesn't know the electrical industry, distribution or reps either. Needs to be replaced. Last guy there got promoted because he was really good. Company flatlining in sales since previous CEO left
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Replace President of company with someone competent.

review.title: “Very pleasant place to work, very good people, growing company”
review.pros: Pros – Great benefits, great vacation plan, great advanacement opportunities- people with heart and great values.
review.cons: Cons – Company has grown a lot in the last few years, sometimes we play "catch up" with our processes.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Get better organized and strengthen employee communication

review.title: “Incompetence, Lies, and Deceitfulness at Stafford Location”

review.title: “Back seat management, ridiculous, micro manage, liars, highly stressful”

review.cons: Cons – The most ridiculous place that I have ever managed. Upper management uses this position to be cycled so they can keep their jobs. Once you have been two Germany for training six months later you will be fired or asked to resign. They hire management for this position once every year.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – You won't listen why bother

review.title: “Micro manager, constantly looking over your shoulder, never satisfied.”

review.cons: Cons – The company goes through one project manager per year since 2004 on the average. If you're hired you will have to go to Germany for training within six months after coming back from Germany you will have its three to six months before you quit or ask to resign.
